12 enum class AttribMask : unsigned int
13 {
14  GL_NONE_BIT = 0x0, // Generic GL_NONE_BIT
15  GL_CURRENT_BIT = 0x00000001,
16  GL_POINT_BIT = 0x00000002,
17  GL_LINE_BIT = 0x00000004,
18  GL_POLYGON_BIT = 0x00000008,
19  GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE_BIT = 0x00000010,
20  GL_PIXEL_MODE_BIT = 0x00000020,
21  GL_LIGHTING_BIT = 0x00000040,
22  GL_FOG_BIT = 0x00000080,
23  GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT = 0x00000100,
24  GL_ACCUM_BUFFER_BIT = 0x00000200,
25  GL_STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT = 0x00000400,
26  GL_VIEWPORT_BIT = 0x00000800,
27  GL_TRANSFORM_BIT = 0x00001000,
28  GL_ENABLE_BIT = 0x00002000,
29  GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT = 0x00004000,
30  GL_HINT_BIT = 0x00008000,
31  GL_EVAL_BIT = 0x00010000,
32  GL_LIST_BIT = 0x00020000,
33  GL_TEXTURE_BIT = 0x00040000,
34  GL_SCISSOR_BIT = 0x00080000,
35  GL_MULTISAMPLE_BIT = 0x20000000,
36  GL_MULTISAMPLE_BIT_3DFX = 0x20000000,
37  GL_MULTISAMPLE_BIT_ARB = 0x20000000,
38  GL_MULTISAMPLE_BIT_EXT = 0x20000000,
39  GL_ALL_ATTRIB_BITS = 0xFFFFFFFF,
40 };
